items.title: Men's Power Rankings: Biggest early-season risers
items.description: Five teams improved their standing by at least seven spots through the first 10 days of the season.

items.title: 'I can't do it anymore': Tony Elliott contemplated leaving football entirely. Instead, he built a contender
items.description: The Virginia coach reflects on the personal and professional changes in his life three years after the shooting that killed three of his players.

items.description: This week features four ranked matchups that could shift the playoff picture dramatically.

items.title: MLS switching schedule to align with world soccer
items.description: The MLS board of governors voted Thursday to align with the international soccer calendar by shifting the regular season to a summer to spring campaig...
